description: 7.62x54mmR ammunition with 150gr FMJ bullets. This bullet has been imbued by a druid's will and pollen will explode on landing, which can blind and slow.
7.62x54mmR ammunition with 150gr FMJ bullets. This bullet has been magically shaped by an Earthshaper to turn into fragments upon impact.
7.62x54mmR ammunition with 150gr FMJ bullets. This bullet has been imbued with fire from a Kelvinist.
7.62x54mmR ammunition with 150gr FMJ bullets. This bullet has been imbued with ice from a Kelvinist and will try to freeze enemies in place.
7.62x54mmR ammunition with 150gr FMJ bullets. This bullet has been imbued with lightning from a Stormshaper and will bounce from enemy to enemy.
7.62x54mmR ammunition with 150gr FMJ bullets. This bullet has been tinkered with by a technomancer to corrupt robotics.
